title: Biography of an atomic vet
creator_credit: Richard Schmiechen, Television Laboratory, WNET (Television station : New York, N.Y.) and Nick Mazzuco
brief_description: A personal account of one man’s involvement in the above ground atomic tests that took place in the United States during the 1950’s. Nick Mazzucco recalls the growing awareness of the massive ignorance and indifference of the government in the acceptance of ‘safe radiation levels’.
